all_orbs.name: No Orb
all_orbs.description: There is no orb on this space.

green.name: Unknown Green Orb
green.description: This is an unspecified Green Orb. It is some sort of item that the owner can use on themself.

blue.name: Unknown Blue Orb
blue.description: This is an unspecified Blue Orb. It is some sort of item that protects the owner from something.

yellow.name: Unknown Yellow Orb
yellow.description: This is an unspecified Yellow Orb. It can be placed on the board, and something will happen to whomever lands on it.

red.name: Unknown Red Orb
red.description: This is an unspecified Red Orb. It can be placed on the board, and something will happen to whomever passes or lands on it.

mushroom.name: Mushroom Orb
mushroom.description: When this orb is used, it will cause the player to roll two dice blocks instead of one. They will move the combined number of spaces.

gold_mushroom.name: Super 'Shroom Orb
gold_mushroom.description: When this orb is used, it will cause the player to roll three dice blocks instead of one. They will move the combined number of spaces.

slug_mushroom.name: Sluggish 'Shroom Orb
slug_mushroom.description: When this orb is used, it will cause the player to roll a dice block that goes in slow motion, allowing them to choose which number they get.

metal_mushroom.name: Metal Mushroom Orb
metal_mushroom.description: When this orb is used, it will cause the player to turn into metal, avoiding the effects of any orb space that they pass or land on this turn.

bullet_bill.name: Bullet Bill Orb
bullet_bill.description: When this orb is used, it will cause the player to ride a bullet bill, stealing 20 coins from any other player that they pass this turn.

warp_pipe.name: Warp Pipe Orb
warp_pipe.description: When this orb is used, it will cause the player to spin a wheel with the other players on it. They will then switch places with whomever the wheel landed on.

flutter.name: Flutter Orb
flutter.description: When this orb is used, it will cause the player to summon flutter, who will move the player to one space before the current star space.

blizzard.name: Mr. Blizzard Orb
blizzard.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone lands on it, that player will lose all their orbs.

bob-omb.name: Bob-omb Orb
bob-omb.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone passes it, they will only move half as far as they were supposed to.

boo-away.name: Boo-Away Orb
boo-away.description: This orb cannot be used or placed. If someone attempts to steal from the orb holder with Boo, the steal will fail and the orb will be consumed.

goomba.name: Goomba Orb
goomba.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone lands on it, that player will roll a dice block to determine how many coins they give the orb placer.

kamek.name: Kamek Orb
kamek.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone lands on it, that player will give a random orb they placed on the board to the orb placer.

klepto.name: Klepto Orb
klepto.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone lands on it, that player will go back to the start.

koopa.name: Koopa Troopa Orb
koopa.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone passes it, they will switch places with the orb placer.

piranha.name: Piranha Plant Orb
piranha.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone lands on it, that player will give half their coins to the orb placer.

podoboo.name: Podoboo Orb
podoboo.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone passes it, they will lose 10 coins.

snack.name: Snack Orb
snack.description: This orb cannot be used or placed. If a Chain Chomp tries to steal from the holder of this orb, the Chain Chomp will fail to steal from them, and the orb will be consumed.

spiny.name: Spiny Orb
spiny.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone lands on it, that player will lose 10 coins.

thwomp.name: Thwomp Orb
thwomp.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone passes it, they will stop moving.

toady.name: Toady Orb
toady.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone lands on it, that player will lose an orb.

tweester.name: Tweester Orb
tweester.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone passes it, they will be moved to a random space.

zap.name: Zap Orb
zap.description: This orb is placed on the board. When someone passes it, they will lose 5 coins for every additional space they move.
